description: Unique surrogate identifier for this general expense record; used as the primary key for joins and deduplication.
Date-time the expense entry was captured in the system (format yyyymmddhhmmssSSS). May represent creation or last-update time; confirm with SME.
Short textual description or category of the expense, used for reporting and classification.
Total monetary amount for the expense line or transaction, typically in the organizationâ€™s base currency; decimals represent cents.
Identifier from the prior/legacy system that corresponds to this record, used for historical reference and cross-system traceability.
Name of the source table in the legacy system where this record originated; supports migration lineage and troubleshooting.
